entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • iOS - Can't change appIcon / splash #18414
  • clang++ exited with code 1 #17236
  • What is the MAUI future ? #18408
  • Publish on `Windows` fails with `The target '_GenerateAppxPackage' does not exist in the project` #17680

Updated

  • DisplayActionSheet doesn't show up on macOS #18156
    Backlog
  • [Enhancement] [Android] In WebView on Android, respect <input type="file" capture="camera" /> #884
    Backlog
  • Text Color for Button, Picker, CheckBox cannot be changed on Windows, iOS, MacCatalyst #18393
  • Unloded and Loaded events invoke multiple times at start #18403
  • UITests/DeviceTests TODOS #15113
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • CollectionViewSource #3837
    Backlog
  • [Mac] [iOS] [Test Flight] Crash on Published IPA #17446
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] System.TypeLoadException with .NET 8 #17136
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Send SMS without opening default messaging app #18375
    Backlog
  • Memory leak when scrolling a CollectionView with IsGrouped=true #17698
    Backlog
  • MapWKUIDelegate conditional compilation for MacCatalyst #18394
    Backlog
  • In a ToolbarItems, if an item has no icon but just text, MAUI uses the icon from the previous page in the Navigation #7823
    Under Consideration
  • [ANR][Android and Windows] crashes when navigating #18331
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • [net8.0] Update stable branding #18384
    .NET 8 GA
  • Bump MemoryAnalyzers from 0.1.0-beta.3 to 0.1.0-beta.4 #18343
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.3] Update .NET 7 MAUI Version #18412

Updated

  • [net8.0] Bump xharness for rtm and bring iOS17 tests #18353
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • set the parents to installer #18086
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨, .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Implement gestures on Spans #17731
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-label, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, .NET 8 SR2
  • Add remapping extensions for core #17918
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, .NET 8 SR1
  • Add support for running Appium tests with BrowserStack #18312
